name: Mister Furry
description:
Mister Furry is an Entertaining Arcade Game, consisting of a Series of Exciting Mini-Games with the Attractive Furry Boys 🦊
Beautiful Furry Boys, Amazing Atmosphere, Great Music, 58 Levels with Full HD Furry Artworks.
Great for relaxing after a hard day at work. Join us!
Unique Features
Nine Game Modes
Dynamic Gameplay and Various Difficulty Levels
58 Wonderful Levels with Full HD Furry Artwork
Amazing Atmosphere & Great Music
100 Achievements
Cheat Code to Complete the Level - "FURRY" Game Modes
Furry Tron
Furball
Furrman
Furry Cutter
Catch the Furry!
Puzzle
Rock, Paper, Scissors
Furry Snake
Space Invaders
Many thanks to our artists!
TotesFleisch8
Danomil
Paintchaser
Snejek
